t: Data Archiving in AWS | Amazon Web Services
s: The real value of AWS Storage is in maximizing the value of your digital assets. AWS Storage solutions for data archiving provide unlimited scale, high durability, data reliability, and highest standards of data security, all with lower costs and faster access times than on-premises tape storage.

t: Amazon: How to find and archive old orders
s: June 21, 2024 - Visit the Amazon website on your computer. Hover the mouse cursor over the Accounts & Lists option in the upper-right corner. Choose Your Orders from the drop-down menu. Click the Archive order button in the lower-left corner to archive an order.
